original_text: When the time came for the evening sacrifice, I stood up. I still wore my shirt and coat that I had torn because I was so sad. Then I went down on my knees. I held out my hands and I prayed to the Lord, my God.
korean_text: 저녁 제사를 드릴 때에 내가 근심 중에 일어나서 속옷과 겉옷을 찢은 채 무릎을 꿇고 나의 하나님 여호와를 향하여 손을 들고

sentences.original_text: When the time came for the evening sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 저녁 제사 드릴 때가 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: I still wore my shirt and coat
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여전히 내 속옷과 겉옷을 입고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: that I had torn because I was so sad
Then I went down on my knees
and I prayed to the Lord, my God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 나의 하나님 여호와께 기도했습니다
